title: 12g13  - Driving schools.
text:
Establishments engaged as a business in instructing and teaching motor
vehicle driving are not bona fide educational establishments or institutions
for purposes of Sec 3(s)(5) or Reg 541.215.
html: Establishments engaged as a business in instructing and teaching motor vehicle driving are not bona fide educational establishments or institutions for purposes of Sec 3(s)(5) or Reg 541.215.
